title: Alpha Client replaced legacy client?
body: Today after launching the alpha client it said something about moving it into an older installation folder and now when I click on the original league launcher, it launches the alpha version of the client. Does this mean that the alpha client has replaced the legacy client for alpha users?

replies.body:
The client update is now in the open beta stage. The Legacy client will be available till the end of open beta.

From [Updated Open Client Beta FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h1q6):

> **CAN I KEEP PLAYING ON THE LEGACY CLIENT INDEFINITELY?**
No, sorry. By the end of open beta, the updated client will be a complete replacement for the legacy client (plus a few new features). It takes serious time and resources to support any large piece of software, so we'll focus exclusively on the updated client.

You can launch the Legacy client from the updated client on the login screen.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

{{champion:17}}
